divs: Sighting Detailsmostly white light, pulsing blue and red. drifted slowly across sky, until it was lost from sight behind trees. Took about 10-15 mins to travel about half a mile, no noise was heard and object was about a mile away.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hartley Wintney
There was one other sighting in Hartley Wintney on or around October 20th 2011
Summary: mostly white light, pulsing blue and red. drifted slowly across sky, until it was lost from sight behind trees
